jobTitle: Field Sales Representative/TTI Emerging Account Member
jobDescription: The TTI Emerging Accounts Member sells company products and services via telephone, e-mail and in person to assigned customers and prospects in territory. Penetrates and develops accounts that have been inactive, underpenetrated and/or new to TTI to mine those accounts and generate new business.
